content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the refrigerator in this query description: "there is a rectangular silver refrigerator. it is at the side of the room and next to brown cabinets.". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

The target object is a rectangular silver refrigerator located next to brown cabinets. In view 4, there is a clear view of a silver refrigerator positioned at the side of the room, adjacent to brown cabinets. This matches the description provided in the query.
